GSD.description:
media: atomisp: fix dummy_ptr check to avoid duplicate active_bo

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit 41082d6432e5d8cfaaa49a3864c88a16535f8e95. For more details please see the references link.
